thread.title: France: May Day tests Macron's reform mettle

title: France: May Day tests Macron's reform mettle
text:
France: May Day tests Macron's reform mettle 9:53pm IST - 01:49
Tens of thousands of people are attending a May Day march in Paris against a backdrop of industrial action and discontent stretching from students to the national SNCF railway company. As David Pollard reports, the anger over reforms is becoming a big problem for French President Emmanuel Macron.
Tens of thousands of people are attending a May Day march in Paris against a backdrop of industrial action and discontent stretching from students to the national SNCF railway company. As David Pollard reports, the anger over reforms is becoming a big problem for French President Emmanuel Macron. //reut.rs/2Fvo4Dz
